EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Cloud Native Workshop_NJ_Q116.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Confirmed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://pivotal.io/event/cloud-native-workshop/nj]]> Thank you for registering for the upcoming Cloud Native Workshop in New Jersey. See event details below:
Date: February 25, 2016 Time: 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM EST Location: 100 Parsons Pond Dr, Franklin Lakes, NJ 07417
{{my.Save The Date:default=edit me}}
Questions? Please contact us via email <[[mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io]]> or visit our website <[[http://pivotal.io/event/cloud-native-workshop/nj]]>.
